Social media circulation: The claim was initially shared on social media platforms, including Twitter and Facebook, by multiple users. Some of these users had a significant following, including politicians and political party accounts.
Multiple instances of circulation: The claim was found to have been circulated multiple times over the years, indicating a sustained effort to propagate it. It was shared by various Twitter users followed by BJP leaders, suggesting a potential political agenda behind its dissemination.
Sharing on websites: blogs: The image and claim were also shared on several websites and blogs, further contributing to its visibility and potential reach.
Verification through reverse image searc: The authenticity of the claim was verified by conducting a reverse image search, which led to the original publication of the photograph by Outlook Magazine in 2014. The image was captioned differently, indicating that the narrative used in circulating the claim was false.
